product_name: HP Z3700 /Slim form with USB receiver,16 month battery life, 1200DPI Wireless Optical Mouse (2.4GHz Wireless, Silver)
description: Wireless, Interface: 2.4GHz Wireless, Optical Mouse, Blue LED technology, USB receiver fits inside the mouse, Operates on 1 AA battery with up to 16 months of battery life, Multi-Surface Sensor Technology, Supports Windows 10, 11, Mac OS, and Chrome OS.
